NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
COLEUS: The projection pool has been installed, Oeno! Now, we will be able to travel to this site easily for future work.
2
1
CYCAD: Looking through the projection pool, this space seems rather small, Coleus.. Will there be enough space for the warp receiver?
3 2
OENO: Haven't you heard, Cycad? We won't be constructing a warp receiver to enter the <color=orange>Sanctuary.</color>
4 3
OENO: For this project, we will be using the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop's</color> latest invention to journey to this space instead.
5 3
OENO: Furthermore, this new invention will even allow us to freely use the rule of quantum entanglement!
6
5
COLEUS: Indeed. And fortunately for us, Daz has asked all of us to use his invention during the <color=orange>Sanctuary's</color> construction!
7
6
OENO: I cannot wait, Coleus! I am sure this technology will be truly revolutionary for our clan.
8
7
OENO: Cycad, you must visit the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> to learn more about Daz's invention when you can!
Campsite EX3 8
SY R4 8
Workshop R1 8
